duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform HVAC troubleshooting, plumbing, pipefitting, and mechanical equipment service in residential, light commercial, and heavy commercial markets.
Obtain and maintain necessary licenses and operational knowledge for refrigerants, boilers, and steam.
Demonstrate good verbal and written communication skills in the execution of duties.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years of practical working experience in HVAC plumbing, pipefitting, and/or mechanical equipment service industry.
Valid driver's license and appropriate licenses for refrigerants, boiler, and steam operational & service knowledge.
Good verbal and written communication skills.
